name: the CakePHP 2.x version of this awesome list
this wiki with a list of not-yet upgraded plugins
AssetCompress plugin
description: A complete asset manager for CakePHP.

name: Assets plugin
description: Dynamic and "on the fly" asset files.

name: Less plugin
description: Less parser plugin for CakePHP.

name: MinifyHtml plugin
description: Compress HTML output.

name: AuditStash plugin
description: Flexible and rock solid audit log tracking.

name: DatabaseLog plugin
description: Simple and stand-alone logging to database instead of files.

name: Muffin/Footprint plugin
description: Plugin to allow passing currently logged in user to model layer.

name: Version plugin
description: A plugin that facilitates versioned database entities.

name: Acl plugin
description: Managing ACL as database approach.

name: ADmad/HybridAuth plugin
description: A plugin which allows using the HybridAuth social sign on library with CakePHP.

name: ADmad/JwtAuth plugin
description: A plugin for authenticating using JSON Web Tokens.

name: CakeDC/NavAuth plugin
description: A plugin for authenticating against NavisionÂ® service using SOAP or OData services. It includes NTLM authentication and more.

name: CakeDC/Users plugin
description: Complete user management (admin panel, remember me, etc), Social login (FB, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google, Instagram), RBAC, API and more.

name: CookieAuth plugin
description: A simple Cake 3 plugin to automatically authenticate users with Cookies.

name: HierAuth plugin
description: A CakePHP plugin for hierarchical, role based, simple authorization.

name: Muffin/OAuth2 plugin
description: OAuth2 authentication using the league/oauth2-client.

name: Muffin/Tokenize plugin
description: Event driven behavior for easily generating single-use security tokens.

name: MultiTenant plugin
description: Easily build SaaS enabled web applications.

name: TinyAuth plugin
description: Authentication and role based (single/multi) authorization as very light-weight approach.

name: Tools:Passwordable
description: Containing Passwordable behavior for a DRY approach on password hashing.

name: TwoFactorAuth plugin
description: Allows two factor authentication using Google Authenticator or similar app to generate one-time codes. Based on RobThree/TwoFactorAuth library.

name: UserPermissions plugin
description: Allow groups of users or single users to view a specific page.

name: Cache plugin
description: For caching views (HTML, CSV, JSON, XML, ...) as static cache files.

name: IdeHelper plugin
description: Helps to make IDE support better by adding annotations to your existing code similar to what baking does to new code.

name: TestHelper plugin
description: Provides testing enhancements and TDD support as browser backend.

name: Airbrake plugin A plugin to seamlessly integrate Airbrake with CakePHP for errors and exceptions.
DebugKit plugin
description: The de-facto standard for debugging.

name: ErrorEmail plugin
description: A plugin to email exception/error information to your dev team.

name: Execution order
description: A demo app to display the execution order of files, methods and callbacks.

name: Psa/FixtureCheck plugin
description: A plugin to help detect mismatches in live DB and fixtures in order to make fixture based tests more reliable and deployments safer.

name: Sentry plugin A plugin to seamlessly integrate Sentry with CakePHP for errors and exceptions.
Setup plugin
description: A lightweight setup plugin containing debugging and maintenance tools.

name: Whoops plugin
description: PHP errors and exceptions for cool kids with filp/whoops.

name: PimpleDi plugin Allows dependency injection based on Pimple library.
PipingBag plugin
description: Dependency injection container plugin that adds the ability to configure object instances and their dependencies before they are used, and to store them into a container class for easy access.

name: PaypalWPP plugin
description: A package for communicating with Paypal Web Payments Pro for transactions and information about your account.

name: EmailQueue plugin
description: Email queue plugin with a preview and sender shell.

name: Gourmet/Email plugin
description: Email helper, layout and more.

name: Mailgun plugin
description: Email transport plugin for sending email via Mailgun.

name: SparkPost plugin
description: Email transport plugin for sending email via the SparkPost API.

name: Environments plugin
description: Plugin to handle environments.

name: Gourmet/Aroma plugin
description: Database based configuration.

name: Settings plugin
description: A plugin to manage your settings via your database.

name: Setup plugin
description: Plugin to handle very basic environments.

name: FileStorage plugin
description: Abstract file storage and upload plugin.

name: FlyPie plugin
description: Abstract filesystem access using Flysystem.

name: FriendsOfCake/Upload plugin

name: Image plugin
description: Image behavior that works much like Cake's built in TranslateBehavior.

name: Proffer plugin
description: A customisable upload plugin with thumbnail generation.

name: Upload plugin
description: A little plugin to upload file.

name: Gourmet/Filters plugin
description: Extra dispatcher filters (maintenance, robots, ip, etc).

name: Gourmet/Validation plugin
description: Extra validation providers (Respect, IsoCodes, etc.) and rules.

name: HtmlPurifier plugin

description: Purifier Plugin Behavior that cleanses data before it is marshaled into the entity and/or before saving.

name: Geo plugin
description: Containing Geocoder behavior and GoogleMaps helper.

name: ADmad/I18n plugin
description: A plugin with I18n related tools.

name: Localized plugin
description: Localized validation and ready-to-use translation PO files.

description: A plugin with shadow table based replacement for core's Translate behavior.

name: Transifex plugin
description: Managing i18n PO files and translations via Transifex API.

name: Translate plugin

description: PHP task runner and deployment package.

name: Ajax plugin

description: A plugin to add enumeration list support to your app.

name: Hashid plugin
